project_abstract.cdata: The project objectives are to: (a) improve the capability of the Government of Tamil Nadu to analyze development constraints and establish priorities; (b) further develop the institutions for rendering more cost-effective service to farmers; and (c) support selected priority state investment programs in agricultural and rural development identified in the state agricultural perspective plan.  To achieve these objectives, the project will comprise the following components: (a) agricultural planning; (b) agricultural extension; (c) seed production; (d) integrated watershed development; (e) livestock development; (f) forestry development; (g) rural road infrastructure; (h) rural water supply.
